contribution.purpose: National and administrative level risk assessment

description: SWIO RAFI Seychelles Non-Tropical Cyclone Pluvial Flood

events.description: SYC NTC Pluvial Flood 10yr event, depth (mm)

footprints._cf1_fp_data_query: ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(lon,lat), 4326) AS the_geom, i10_year AS intensity FROM paul.ntc_syc_fpf
